item.title: Intel earnings aren’t swaying the skeptics: ‘This fight is far from over.’
item.description: Analysts say Intel’s hot demand stems primarily from older chips, and they worry about profit pressure down the road.

item.title: Hedge-fund industry assets soar to record $5 trillion. Why the biggest firms are getting even bigger.
item.description: The hedge-fund industry saw its assets under management swell to a record $4.98 trillion during the third quarter, with funds taking in their biggest ...

item.title: Why Ford is doubling down on the F-150 — and redeploying EV workers
item.description: Ford is adding extra workers and taking other measures to meet “strong” customer demand for its F-Series pickup trucks, while making up for production...

item.title: Social Security’s COLA will be 2.8% in 2026 — first percentage increase in four years
item.description: Social Security’s cost-of-living adjustment will be 2.8% in 2026, up from 2.5% this year, the Social Security Administration said on Friday.

item.title: The Fed’s message to investors needs to be much clearer
item.description: U.S. central bank should do more to help Americans navigate this unfamiliar and unpredictable economy.
